BBEX3.A.SYP.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the Syrian Arab Republic / USD 1 = SYP ... (buying)

General: Alongside the reported rates the former official exchange rate of USD 1 = SYP 11.20 / 11.25 (buying/selling) exists for a few debt service payments on the basis of bilateral payment agreements.
Source: Central Bank of Syria, Damascus
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
